66VolCartesian::VolCartesian()
67#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
68 : VolumeKernel(MPI_COMM_NULL, 0, false)
69#else
70 : VolumeKernel(false)
71#endif
72{
73 initialize();
74}

84VolCartesian::VolCartesian(int dimension,
85 const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
86 const std::array<double, 3> &lengths,
87 const std::array<int, 3> &nCells)
88 : VolCartesian(PatchManager::AUTOMATIC_ID, dimension, origin, lengths, nCells)
89{
90}

101VolCartesian::VolCartesian(int id, int dimension,
102 const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
103 const std::array<double, 3> &lengths,
104 const std::array<int, 3> &nCells)
105#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
106 : VolumeKernel(id, dimension, MPI_COMM_NULL, 0, false)
107#else
108 : VolumeKernel(id, dimension, false)
109#endif
110{
111 initialize();
112
113 setOrigin(origin);
114 setLengths(lengths);
115
116 setDiscretization(nCells);
117}

143VolCartesian::VolCartesian(int id, int dimension,
144 const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
145 double length, int nCells)
146#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
147 : VolumeKernel(id, dimension, MPI_COMM_NULL, 0, false)
148#else
149 : VolumeKernel(id, dimension, false)
150#endif
151{
152 initialize();
153
154 setOrigin(origin);
155 setLengths({{length, length, length}});
156
157 setDiscretization({{nCells, nCells, nCells}});
158}

168VolCartesian::VolCartesian(int dimension,
169 const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
170 double length, double dh)
171 : VolCartesian(PatchManager::AUTOMATIC_ID, dimension, origin, length, dh)
172{
173}
174
184VolCartesian::VolCartesian(int id, int dimension,
185 const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
186 double length, double dh)
187#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
188 : VolumeKernel(id, dimension, MPI_COMM_NULL, 0, false)
189#else
190 : VolumeKernel(id, dimension, false)
191#endif
192{
193 initialize();
194
195 setOrigin(origin);
196 setLengths({{length, length, length}});
197
198 int nCells = (int) std::ceil(length / dh);
199 setDiscretization({{nCells, nCells, nCells}});
200}
201
207VolCartesian::VolCartesian(std::istream &stream)
208#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
209 : VolumeKernel(MPI_COMM_NULL, 0, false)
210#else
211 : VolumeKernel(false)
212#endif
213{
214 initialize();
215 restore(stream);
216}

223std::unique_ptr<PatchKernel> VolCartesian::clone() const
224{
225 return std::unique_ptr<VolCartesian>(new VolCartesian(*this));
226}
227
231void VolCartesian::reset()
232{
233 // Switch to light memeory mode
234 switchMemoryMode(MEMORY_LIGHT);
235
236 // Reset geometry and discretization
237 m_minCoords = {{0., 0., 0.}};
238 m_maxCoords = {{1., 1., 1.}};
239
240 m_nCells1D = {{0, 0, 0}};
241 m_nVertices1D = {{0, 0, 0}};
242 m_cellSpacings = {{0., 0., 0.}};
243
244 for (int n = 0; n < 3; ++n) {
245 std::vector<double>().swap(m_vertexCoords[n]);
246 std::vector<double>().swap(m_cellCenters[n]);
247 }
248
249 m_nVertices = 0;
250 m_nCells = 0;
251 m_nInterfaces = 0;
252}
253
257void VolCartesian::resetInterfaces()
258{
259 PatchKernel::resetInterfaces();
260}
261
262
268void VolCartesian::_updateAdjacencies()
269{
270 // Partial updates are not supported
271 CellConstIterator beginItr = cellConstBegin();
272 CellConstIterator endItr = cellConstEnd();
273
274 bool partialUpdate = false;
275 for (CellConstIterator cellIterator = beginItr; cellIterator != endItr; ++cellIterator) {
276 long cellId = cellIterator.getId();
277 if (!testCellAlterationFlags(cellId, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY)) {
278 partialUpdate = true;
279 break;
280 }
281 }
282
283 if (partialUpdate) {
284 log::cout() << " It is not possible to partially update the adjacencies.";
285 log::cout() << " All adjacencies will be updated.";
286 }
287
288 // Update adjacencies
289 int nCellFaces = 2 * getDimension();
290 for (Cell &cell : getCells()) {
291 // Reset cell adjacencies
292 if (cell.getAdjacencyCount() != 0) {
293 cell.resetAdjacencies();
294 }
295
296 // Evaluate adjacencies
297 long cellId = cell.getId();
298 for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
299 // Identify face neighbour
300 long neighId = getCellFaceNeighsLinearId(cellId, face);
301 if (neighId < 0) {
302 continue;
303 }
304
305 // Add adjacency
306 cell.pushAdjacency(face, neighId);
307 }
308 }
309}
310
317void VolCartesian::_updateInterfaces()
318{
319 // Partial updates are not supported
320 CellConstIterator beginItr = cellConstBegin();
321 CellConstIterator endItr = cellConstEnd();
322
323 bool partialUpdate = false;
324 for (CellConstIterator cellIterator = beginItr; cellIterator != endItr; ++cellIterator) {
325 long cellId = cellIterator.getId();
326 if (!testCellAlterationFlags(cellId, FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY)) {
327 partialUpdate = true;
328 break;
329 }
330 }
331
332 if (partialUpdate) {
333 log::cout() << " It is not possible to partially update the interfaces.";
334 log::cout() << " All interfaces will be updated.";
335 }
336
337 // Build interfaces
338 if (getMemoryMode() == MemoryMode::MEMORY_NORMAL) {
339 int nCellFaces = 2 * getDimension();
340
341 // Info on the interfaces
342 ElementType interfaceType = getInterfaceType();
343
344 const ReferenceElementInfo &interfaceTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(interfaceType);
345 const int nInterfaceVertices = interfaceTypeInfo.nVertices;
346
347 // Enable advanced editing
348 setExpert(true);
349
350 // Initialize interfaces
351 for (Cell &cell : getCells()) {
352 cell.setInterfaces(FlatVector2D<long>(nCellFaces, 1, Interface::NULL_ID));
353 }
354
355 // Build interfaces
356 for (Cell &cell : getCells()) {
357 long cellId = cell.getId();
358 for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
359 // Get neighbour information
360 //
361 // The interface between two cells needs to be processed only
362 // once. In order to ensure this, we build an interface if the
363 // faces is a border, or if the id of this cell is lower than
364 // the id of its neighbour.
365 long neighId;
366 if (cell.getAdjacencyCount(face) > 0) {
367 neighId = cell.getAdjacencies(face)[0];
368 if (neighId < cellId) {
369 continue;
370 }
371 } else {
372 neighId = Cell::NULL_ID;
373 }
374
375 // Create the interface
376 InterfaceIterator interfaceIterator = VolumeKernel::addInterface(interfaceType);
377 Interface &interface = *interfaceIterator;
378 long interfaceId = interface.getId();
379
380 // Set connectivity
381 ConstProxyVector<long> faceConnect = cell.getFaceConnect(face);
382 int connectSize = faceConnect.size();
383
384 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connect = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[nInterfaceVertices]);
385 for (int k = 0; k < connectSize; ++k) {
386 connect[k] = faceConnect[k];
387 }
388 interface.setConnect(std::move(connect));
389
390 // Set owner data
391 interface.setOwner(cellId, face);
392 cell.setInterface(face, 0, interfaceId);
393
394 // Neighbour data
395 if (neighId >= 0) {
396 Cell &neigh = getCell(neighId);
397 int neighFace = 2 * static_cast<int>(std::floor(face / 2.)) + (1 - face % 2);
398
399 interface.setNeigh(neighId, neighFace);
400 neigh.setInterface(neighFace, 0, interfaceId);
401 } else {
402 interface.unsetNeigh();
403 }
404 }
405 }
406
407 // Disable advanced editing
408 setExpert(false);
409 }
410}
411
415void VolCartesian::initialize()
416{
417 // Normals
418 int i = 0;
419 for (int n = 0; n < 3; n++) {
420 for (int k = -1; k <= 1; k += 2) {
421 std::array<double, 3> normal = {{0.0, 0.0, 0.0}};
422 normal[n] = k;
423
424 m_normals[i++] = normal;
425 }
426 }
427
428 // Deltas for the evaluation of the vertex neighbours
429 m_vertexNeighDeltas = std::vector<std::array<int, 3>>(8);
430 m_vertexNeighDeltas[0] = {{ 0, 0, 0}};
431 m_vertexNeighDeltas[1] = {{-1, 0, 0}};
432 m_vertexNeighDeltas[2] = {{ 0, -1, 0}};
433 m_vertexNeighDeltas[3] = {{-1, -1, 0}};
434 m_vertexNeighDeltas[4] = {{ 0, 0, -1}};
435 m_vertexNeighDeltas[5] = {{-1, 0, -1}};
436 m_vertexNeighDeltas[6] = {{ 0, -1, -1}};
437 m_vertexNeighDeltas[7] = {{-1, -1, -1}};
438
439 // Deltas for the evaluation of the edge neighbours
440 m_edgeNeighDeltas = std::vector<std::array<int, 3>>(12);
441 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 0] = {{-1, 0, -1}};
442 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 1] = {{ 1, 0, -1}};
443 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 2] = {{ 0, -1, -1}};
444 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 3] = {{ 0, 1, -1}};
445 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 4] = {{-1, -1, 0}};
446 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 5] = {{ 1, -1, 0}};
447 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 6] = {{-1, 1, 0}};
448 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 7] = {{ 1, 1, 0}};
449 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 8] = {{-1, 0, 1}};
450 m_edgeNeighDeltas[ 9] = {{ 1, 0, 1}};
451 m_edgeNeighDeltas[10] = {{ 0, -1, 1}};
452 m_edgeNeighDeltas[11] = {{ 0, 1, 1}};
453
454 // Faces associated to the edges
455 m_edgeFaces = std::vector<std::array<int, 2>>(12);
456 m_edgeFaces[ 0] = {{ 0, 4}};
457 m_edgeFaces[ 1] = {{ 1, 4}};
458 m_edgeFaces[ 2] = {{ 2, 4}};
459 m_edgeFaces[ 3] = {{ 3, 4}};
460 m_edgeFaces[ 4] = {{ 0, 2}};
461 m_edgeFaces[ 5] = {{ 1, 2}};
462 m_edgeFaces[ 6] = {{ 0, 3}};
463 m_edgeFaces[ 7] = {{ 1, 3}};
464 m_edgeFaces[ 8] = {{ 0, 5}};
465 m_edgeFaces[ 9] = {{ 1, 5}};
466 m_edgeFaces[10] = {{ 2, 5}};
467 m_edgeFaces[11] = {{ 3, 5}};
468
469 // Set the bounding box as frozen
470 setBoundingBoxFrozen(true);
471
472 // This patch need to be spawn
473 setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_NEEDED);
474
475 // Set the light memory mode
476 setMemoryMode(MemoryMode::MEMORY_LIGHT);
477
478 // Reset the patch
479 reset();
480}
481
485void VolCartesian::initializeCellVolume()
486{
487 m_cellVolume = 1;
488 for (int d = 0; d < getDimension(); ++d) {
489 if (m_directionOrdering[d] >= 0) {
490 m_cellVolume *= m_cellSpacings[d];
491 }
492 }
493}
494
498void VolCartesian::initializeCellSize()
499{
500 m_cellSize = std::pow(m_cellVolume, 1. / getDimension());
501}
502
506void VolCartesian::initializeInterfaceArea()
507{
508 for (int d = 0; d < getDimension(); ++d) {
509 if (m_directionOrdering[d] >= 0) {
510 m_interfaceArea[d] = m_cellVolume / m_cellSpacings[d];
511 } else {
512 m_interfaceArea[d] = 0.;
513 }
514 }
515}
516
522void VolCartesian::setDiscretization(const std::array<int, 3> &nCells)
523{
524 // Spacing
525 for (int d = 0; d < getDimension(); ++d) {
526 // Initialize cells
527 if (nCells[d] > 0) {
528 m_nCells1D[d] = nCells[d];
529 m_cellSpacings[d] = (m_maxCoords[d] - m_minCoords[d]) / m_nCells1D[d];
530
531 m_cellCenters[d].resize(m_nCells1D[d]);
532 for (int i = 0; i < m_nCells1D[d]; i++) {
533 m_cellCenters[d][i] = m_minCoords[d] + (0.5 + i) * m_cellSpacings[d];
534 }
535 } else {
536 m_nCells1D[d] = 0;
537 m_cellSpacings[d] = 0.;
538 }
539
540 log::cout() << " - Cell count along direction " << d << " : " << m_nCells1D[d] << "\n";
541
542 // Initialize vertices
543 m_nVertices1D[d] = m_nCells1D[d] + 1;
544
545 m_vertexCoords[d].resize(m_nVertices1D[d]);
546 for (int i = 0; i < m_nVertices1D[d]; i++) {
547 m_vertexCoords[d][i] = m_minCoords[d] + i * m_cellSpacings[d];
548 }
549 }
550
551 for (int d = getDimension(); d < 3; ++d) {
552 m_nCells1D[d] = 0;
553 m_cellSpacings[d] = 0.;
554
555 m_nVertices1D[d] = 1;
556 }
557
558 log::cout() << std::endl;
559
560 // Define direction ordering
561 //
562 // It is the ordering in which the different directions will be considered
563 // when numbering cell, vertices, ... For each direction, it will contain
564 // the order in which the direction should be considered or -1 if there
565 // are no cells along the direction.
566 for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d) {
567 if (d == 0) {
568 m_directionOrdering[d] = 0;
569 } else {
570 int previousDirection = m_directionOrdering[d - 1];
571 if (previousDirection < 0 || previousDirection >= 2) {
572 m_directionOrdering[d] = -1;
573 continue;
574 }
575
576 m_directionOrdering[d] = previousDirection + 1;
577 }
578
579 while (m_nCells1D[m_directionOrdering[d]] == 0) {
580 if (m_directionOrdering[d] == 2) {
581 m_directionOrdering[d] = -1;
582 break;
583 }
584
585 ++m_directionOrdering[d];
586 }
587 }
588
589 // Count the total number of vertices
590 m_nVertices = 1;
591 for (int n = 0; n < getDimension(); ++n) {
592 m_nVertices *= m_nVertices1D[n];
593 }
594 log::cout() << " - Total vertex count: " << m_nVertices << "\n";
595
596 // Count the total number of cells
597 m_nCells = 1;
598 for (int d = 0; d < getDimension(); ++d) {
599 if (m_directionOrdering[d] >= 0) {
600 m_nCells *= m_nCells1D[d];
601 }
602 }
603
604 log::cout() << " - Total cell count: " << m_nCells << "\n";
605
606 // Count the total number of interfaces
607 m_nInterfaces = 0;
608 for (int d = 0; d < getDimension(); ++d) {
609 int nDirectionInterfaces = 1;
610 for (int n = 0; n < getDimension(); n++) {
611 int nDirectionInterfaces1D = m_nCells1D[n];
612 if (n == d) {
613 ++nDirectionInterfaces1D;
614 }
615
616 nDirectionInterfaces *= nDirectionInterfaces1D;
617 }
618 m_nInterfaces += nDirectionInterfaces;
619 }
620
621 log::cout() << " - Total interface count: " << m_nInterfaces << "\n";
622
623 // Cell volume
624 initializeCellVolume();
625
626 // Cell size
627 initializeCellSize();
628
629 // Interface area
630 initializeInterfaceArea();
631
632 // Update patch data structures
633 if (getMemoryMode() == MemoryMode::MEMORY_NORMAL) {
634 // Switch to light mode to reset patchdata structures
635 switchMemoryMode(MemoryMode::MEMORY_LIGHT);
636
637 // Swich back to normal mode to rebuild patchdata structures
638 switchMemoryMode(MemoryMode::MEMORY_NORMAL);
639 }
640}

754std::array<double, 3> VolCartesian::evalVertexCoords(long id) const
755{
756 std::array<int, 3> ijk = getVertexCartesianId(id);
757
758 return evalVertexCoords(ijk);
759}
760
767std::array<double, 3> VolCartesian::evalVertexCoords(const std::array<int, 3> &ijk) const
768{
769 std::array<double, 3> coords;
770 for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d) {
771 if (ijk[d] >= 0) {
772 coords[d] = m_vertexCoords[d][ijk[d]];
773 } else {
774 coords[d] = m_minCoords[d];
775 }
776 }
777
778 return coords;
779}
780
789const std::vector<double> & VolCartesian::getVertexCoords(int direction) const
790{
791 return m_vertexCoords[direction];
792}

869
877void VolCartesian::evalCellBoundingBox(long id, std::array<double,3> *minPoint, std::array<double,3> *maxPoint) const
878{
879 std::array<double,3> cellCentroid = evalCellCentroid(id);
880 for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d) {
881 (*minPoint)[d] = cellCentroid[d] - 0.5 * m_cellSpacings[d];
882 (*maxPoint)[d] = cellCentroid[d] + 0.5 * m_cellSpacings[d];
883 }
884}
885
892double VolCartesian::evalInterfaceArea(long id) const
893{
894 const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
895 int ownerFace = interface.getOwnerFace();
896 int direction = static_cast<int>(std::floor(ownerFace / 2.));
897
898 return m_interfaceArea[direction];
899}
900
907std::array<double, 3> VolCartesian::evalInterfaceNormal(long id) const
908{
909 const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
910 int ownerFace = interface.getOwnerFace();
911
912 return m_normals[ownerFace];
913}
914
920std::array<double, 3> VolCartesian::getSpacing() const
921{
922 return m_cellSpacings;
923}
924
930void VolCartesian::switchMemoryMode(MemoryMode mode)
931{
932 if (mode == getMemoryMode()) {
933 return;
934 }
935
936 // Update the data structures
937 switch (mode) {
938
939 case MemoryMode::MEMORY_NORMAL:
940 // Spawn the patch to activate normal memory mode
941 spawn(false);
942
943 break;
944
945 case MemoryMode::MEMORY_LIGHT:
946 // To put the patch in memory mode we need to reset the generic data
947 // of the patch, therefore we can call the 'reset' implementation of
948 // the kernel.
949 VolumeKernel::reset();
950
951 // Now the patch needs to be spawn
952 setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_NEEDED);
953
954 // Set the light memory mode
955 setMemoryMode(mode);
956
957 break;
958
959 }
960}
961
969void VolCartesian::setMemoryMode(MemoryMode mode)
970{
971 m_memoryMode = mode;
972}
973
979VolCartesian::MemoryMode VolCartesian::getMemoryMode() const
980{
981 return m_memoryMode;
982}
983
991double VolCartesian::getSpacing(int direction) const
992{
993 return m_cellSpacings[direction];
994}
995
1003std::vector<adaption::Info> VolCartesian::_spawn(bool trackSpawn)
1004{
1005 std::vector<adaption::Info> updateInfo;
1006
1007 // If the patch is in 'normal' mode there is nothing to do.
1008 if (getMemoryMode() == MEMORY_NORMAL) {
1009 return updateInfo;
1010 }
1011
1012 // Enable advanced editing
1013 setExpert(true);
1014
1015 // Definition of the mesh
1016 addVertices();
1017 addCells();
1018
1019 // Disable advanced editing
1020 setExpert(false);
1021
1022 // Adaption info
1023 if (trackSpawn) {
1024 updateInfo.emplace_back();
1025 adaption::Info &adaptionCellInfo = updateInfo.back();
1026 adaptionCellInfo.type = adaption::TYPE_CREATION;
1027 adaptionCellInfo.entity = adaption::ENTITY_CELL;
1028 adaptionCellInfo.current.reserve(m_cells.size());
1029 for (auto &cell : m_cells) {
1030 adaptionCellInfo.current.emplace_back();
1031 long &cellId = adaptionCellInfo.current.back();
1032 cellId = cell.getId();
1033 }
1034
1035 updateInfo.emplace_back();
1036 adaption::Info &adaptionInterfaceInfo = updateInfo.back();
1037 adaptionInterfaceInfo.type = adaption::TYPE_CREATION;
1038 adaptionInterfaceInfo.entity = adaption::ENTITY_INTERFACE;
1039 adaptionInterfaceInfo.current.reserve(m_interfaces.size());
1040 for (auto &interface : m_interfaces) {
1041 adaptionInterfaceInfo.current.emplace_back();
1042 long &interfaceId = adaptionInterfaceInfo.current.back();
1043 interfaceId = interface.getId();
1044 }
1045 } else {
1046 updateInfo.emplace_back();
1047 }
1048
1049 // Updating the adaption brings the patch is in normal memory mode
1050 setMemoryMode(MemoryMode::MEMORY_NORMAL);
1051
1052 // Done
1053 return updateInfo;
1054}
1055
1059void VolCartesian::addVertices()
1060{
1061 log::cout() << " >> Creating vertices\n";
1062
1063 log::cout() << " - Vertex count: " << m_nVertices << "\n";
1064
1065 m_vertices.reserve(m_nVertices);
1066 for (int k = 0; (isThreeDimensional()) ? (k < m_nVertices1D[Vertex::COORD_Z]) : (k <= 0); k++) {
1067 for (int j = 0; j < m_nVertices1D[Vertex::COORD_Y]; j++) {
1068 for (int i = 0; i < m_nVertices1D[Vertex::COORD_X]; i++) {
1069 // Linear index of the vertex
1070 long id_vertex = getVertexLinearId(i, j, k);
1071
1072 // Vertex coordinates
1073 std::array<double, 3> coords = evalVertexCoords(id_vertex);
1074
1075 // Add vertex
1076 VolumeKernel::addVertex(std::move(coords), id_vertex);
1077 }
1078 }
1079 }
1080}
1081
1085void VolCartesian::addCells()
1086{
1087 log::cout() << " >> Creating cells\n";
1088
1089 // Info on the cells
1090 ElementType cellType = getCellType();
1091
1092 // Create the cells
1093 log::cout() << " - Cell count: " << m_nCells << "\n";
1094
1095 m_cells.reserve(m_nCells);
1096 for (int k = 0; (isThreeDimensional()) ? (k < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_Z]) : (k <= 0); k++) {
1097 for (int j = 0; j < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_Y]; j++) {
1098 for (int i = 0; i < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_X]; i++) {
1099 long id_cell = getCellLinearId(i, j, k);
1100 CellIterator cellIterator = VolumeKernel::addCell(cellType, id_cell);
1101 Cell &cell = *cellIterator;
1102
1103 // Connettivit
1104 long *cellConnect = cell.getConnect();
1105
1106 cellConnect[0] = getVertexLinearId(i, j, k);
1107 cellConnect[1] = getVertexLinearId(i + 1, j, k);
1108 cellConnect[2] = getVertexLinearId(i, j + 1, k);
1109 cellConnect[3] = getVertexLinearId(i + 1, j + 1, k);
1110 if (cellType == ElementType::VOXEL) {
1111 cellConnect[4] = getVertexLinearId(i, j, k + 1);
1112 cellConnect[5] = getVertexLinearId(i + 1, j, k + 1);
1113 cellConnect[6] = getVertexLinearId(i, j + 1, k + 1);
1114 cellConnect[7] = getVertexLinearId(i + 1, j + 1, k + 1);
1115 }
1116 }
1117 }
1118 }
1119}
1120
1126int VolCartesian::_getDumpVersion() const
1127{
1128 const int DUMP_VERSION = 2;
1129
1130 return DUMP_VERSION;
1131}
1132
1138void VolCartesian::_dump(std::ostream &stream) const
1139{
1140 utils::binary::write(stream, m_minCoords[0]);
1141 utils::binary::write(stream, m_minCoords[1]);
1142 utils::binary::write(stream, m_minCoords[2]);
1143
1144 utils::binary::write(stream, m_maxCoords[0] - m_minCoords[0]);
1145 utils::binary::write(stream, m_maxCoords[1] - m_minCoords[1]);
1146 utils::binary::write(stream, m_maxCoords[2] - m_minCoords[2]);
1147
1148 utils::binary::write(stream, m_nCells1D[0]);
1149 utils::binary::write(stream, m_nCells1D[1]);
1150 utils::binary::write(stream, m_nCells1D[2]);
1151
1152 utils::binary::write(stream, m_memoryMode);
1153
1154 if (m_memoryMode == MEMORY_NORMAL) {
1155 for (const Cell &cell : getCells()) {
1156 utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getPID());
1157 }
1158 }
1159
1160 if (m_memoryMode == MEMORY_NORMAL) {
1161 for (const Interface &interface : getInterfaces()) {
1162 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getPID());
1163 }
1164 }
1165}
1166
1172void VolCartesian::_restore(std::istream &stream)
1173{
1174 // This patch need to be spawn
1175 setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_NEEDED);
1176
1177 // Origin
1178 std::array<double, 3> origin;
1179 utils::binary::read(stream, origin[0]);
1180 utils::binary::read(stream, origin[1]);
1181 utils::binary::read(stream, origin[2]);
1182
1183 setOrigin(origin);
1184
1185 // Lengths
1186 std::array<double, 3> lengths;
1187 utils::binary::read(stream, lengths[0]);
1188 utils::binary::read(stream, lengths[1]);
1189 utils::binary::read(stream, lengths[2]);
1190
1191 setLengths(lengths);
1192
1193 // Discretization
1194 std::array<int, 3> nCells;
1195 utils::binary::read(stream, nCells[0]);
1196 utils::binary::read(stream, nCells[1]);
1197 utils::binary::read(stream, nCells[2]);
1198
1199 setDiscretization(nCells);
1200
1201 // Memory mode
1202 MemoryMode memoryMode;
1203 utils::binary::read(stream, memoryMode);
1204 switchMemoryMode(memoryMode);
1205
1206 // Cell data
1207 if (m_memoryMode == MEMORY_NORMAL) {
1208 for (Cell &cell : getCells()) {
1209 int PID;
1210 utils::binary::read(stream, PID);
1211 cell.setPID(PID);
1212 }
1213 }
1214
1215 // Interface data
1216 if (m_memoryMode == MEMORY_NORMAL) {
1217 for (Interface &interface : getInterfaces()) {
1218 int PID;
1219 utils::binary::read(stream, PID);
1220 interface.setPID(PID);
1221 }
1222 }
1223}
1224
1232bool VolCartesian::isPointInside(long id, const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
1233{
1234 std::array<int, 3> cellIjk = getCellCartesianId(id);
1235
1236 const double EPS = getTol();
1237 for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d){
1238 long index = cellIjk[d];
1239
1240 double spacing = m_cellSpacings[d];
1241 double cellMin = m_cellCenters[d][index] - 0.5 * spacing;
1242 double cellMax = m_cellCenters[d][index] + 0.5 * spacing;
1243
1244 if (point[d]< cellMin - EPS || point[d] > cellMax + EPS) {
1245 return false;
1246 }
1247 }
1248
1249 return true;
1250}
1251
1258bool VolCartesian::isPointInside(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
1259{
1260 const double EPS = getTol();
1261
1262 for (int n = 0; n < getDimension(); n++) {
1263 if (point[n] < m_minCoords[n] - EPS || point[n] > m_maxCoords[n] + EPS) {
1264 return false;
1265 }
1266 }
1267
1268 return true;
1269}
1270
1282long VolCartesian::locatePoint(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
1283{
1284 std::array<int, 3> pointIjk = locatePointCartesian(point);
1285 if (isCellCartesianIdValid(pointIjk)) {
1286 return getCellLinearId(pointIjk);
1287 } else {
1288 return Element::NULL_ID;
1289 }
1290}
1291
1302std::array<int, 3> VolCartesian::locatePointCartesian(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
1303{
1304 std::array<int, 3> ijk;
1305 if (!isPointInside(point)) {
1306 ijk[0] = -1;
1307 ijk[1] = -1;
1308 ijk[2] = -1;
1309
1310 return ijk;
1311 }
1312
1313 ijk[0] = static_cast<int>(std::floor((point[Vertex::COORD_X] - m_minCoords[Vertex::COORD_X]) / m_cellSpacings[Vertex::COORD_X]));
1314 ijk[1] = static_cast<int>(std::floor((point[Vertex::COORD_Y] - m_minCoords[Vertex::COORD_Y]) / m_cellSpacings[Vertex::COORD_Y]));
1315 if (isThreeDimensional()) {
1316 ijk[2] = static_cast<int>(std::floor((point[Vertex::COORD_Z] - m_minCoords[Vertex::COORD_Z]) / m_cellSpacings[Vertex::COORD_Z]));
1317 } else {
1318 ijk[2] = -1;
1319 }
1320
1321 return ijk;
1322}
1323
1330long VolCartesian::locateClosestVertex(std::array<double,3> const &point) const
1331{
1332 return getVertexLinearId(locateClosestVertexCartesian(point));
1333}
1334
1342std::array<int, 3> VolCartesian::locateClosestVertexCartesian(std::array<double,3> const &point) const
1343{
1344 std::array<int, 3> ijk;
1345 for (int n = 0; n < getDimension(); ++n) {
1346 ijk[n] = std::min(m_nVertices1D[n] - 1, std::max(0, (int) round((point[n] - m_minCoords[n]) / m_cellSpacings[n])));
1347 }
1348
1349 if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
1350 ijk[Vertex::COORD_Z] = -1;
1351 }
1352
1353 return ijk;
1354}
1355
1365long VolCartesian::locateClosestCell(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
1366{
1367 std::array<int, 3> pointIjk = locateClosestCellCartesian(point);
1368 return getCellLinearId(pointIjk);
1369}
1370
1380std::array<int, 3> VolCartesian::locateClosestCellCartesian(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
1381{
1382 std::array<int,3> ijk({{0,0,0}});
1383
1384 for( int i=0; i<getDimension(); ++i){
1385 ijk[i] = static_cast<int>(std::floor((point[i] - m_minCoords[i]) / m_cellSpacings[i]));
1386 ijk[i] = std::max( ijk[i], 0 );
1387 ijk[i] = std::min( ijk[i], m_nCells1D[i]-1 );
1388 }
1389
1390 return ijk;
1391}
1392
1407long VolCartesian::getCellLinearId(int i, int j, int k) const
1408{
1409 return getCellLinearId(std::array<int, 3>{{i, j, k}});
1410}
1411
1424long VolCartesian::getCellLinearId(const std::array<int, 3> &ijk) const
1425{
1426 int l = m_directionOrdering[0];
1427 int m = m_directionOrdering[1];
1428 int n = m_directionOrdering[2];
1429
1430 if (l == -1) {
1431 return Cell::NULL_ID;
1432 }
1433
1434 long id = ijk[l];
1435 if (m >= 0) {
1436 id += m_nCells1D[l] * ijk[m];
1437 if (n >= 0) {
1438 id += m_nCells1D[l] * m_nCells1D[m] * ijk[n];
1439 }
1440 }
1441
1442 return id;
1443}
1444
1458std::array<int, 3> VolCartesian::getCellCartesianId(long id) const
1459{
1460 int l = m_directionOrdering[0];
1461 int m = m_directionOrdering[1];
1462 int n = m_directionOrdering[2];
1463
1464 std::array<int, 3> ijk = {{-1, -1, -1}};
1465 if (m == -1) {
1466 ijk[l] = id;
1467 } else if (l >= 0) {
1468 int offset_lm = m_nCells1D[l] * m_nCells1D[m];
1469 int index_n = id / offset_lm;
1470
1471 ijk[m] = (id - index_n * offset_lm) / m_nCells1D[l];
1472 ijk[l] = id - (id / m_nCells1D[l]) * m_nCells1D[l];
1473 if (n != -1) {
1474 ijk[n] = index_n;
1475 }
1476 }
1477
1478 return ijk;
1479}
1480
1487bool VolCartesian::isCellCartesianIdValid(const std::array<int, 3> &ijk) const
1488{
1489 for (int k = 0; k < getDimension(); ++k) {
1490 if (ijk[k] < 0 || ijk[k] >= m_nCells1D[k]) {
1491 return false;
1492 }
1493 }
1494
1495 return true;
1496}
1497
1512long VolCartesian::getVertexLinearId(int i, int j, int k) const
1513{
1514 return getVertexLinearId(std::array<int, 3>{{i, j, k}});
1515}
1516
1529long VolCartesian::getVertexLinearId(const std::array<int, 3> &ijk) const
1530{
1531 int l = m_directionOrdering[0];
1532 int m = m_directionOrdering[1];
1533 int n = m_directionOrdering[2];
1534
1535 if (l == -1) {
1536 return Vertex::NULL_ID;
1537 }
1538
1539 long id = ijk[l];
1540 if (m >= 0) {
1541 id += m_nVertices1D[l] * ijk[m];
1542 if (n >= 0) {
1543 id += m_nVertices1D[l] * m_nVertices1D[m] * ijk[n];
1544 }
1545 }
1546
1547 return id;
1548}
1549
1563std::array<int, 3> VolCartesian::getVertexCartesianId(long id) const
1564{
1565 int l = m_directionOrdering[0];
1566 int m = m_directionOrdering[1];
1567 int n = m_directionOrdering[2];
1568
1569 std::array<int, 3> ijk = {{-1, -1, -1}};
1570 if (m == -1) {
1571 ijk[l] = id;
1572 } else if (l >= 0) {
1573 int offset_lm = m_nVertices1D[l] * m_nVertices1D[m];
1574 int index_n = id / offset_lm;
1575
1576 ijk[m] = (id - index_n * offset_lm) / m_nVertices1D[l];
1577 ijk[l] = id - (id / m_nVertices1D[l]) * m_nVertices1D[l];
1578 if (n != -1) {
1579 ijk[n] = index_n;
1580 }
1581 }
1582
1583 return ijk;
1584}
1585
1600std::array<int, 3> VolCartesian::getVertexCartesianId(long cellId, int vertex) const
1601{
1602 return getVertexCartesianId(getCellCartesianId(cellId), vertex);
1603}
1604
1619std::array<int, 3> VolCartesian::getVertexCartesianId(const std::array<int, 3> &cellIjk, int vertex) const
1620{
1621 std::bitset<3> vertexBitset(vertex);
1622 std::array<int, 3> vertexIjk(cellIjk);
1623 for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1624 vertexIjk[k] += vertexBitset[k];
1625 }
1626
1627 return vertexIjk;
1628}
1629
1636bool VolCartesian::isVertexCartesianIdValid(const std::array<int, 3> &ijk) const
1637{
1638 for (int k = 0; k < getDimension(); ++k) {
1639 if (ijk[k] < 0 || ijk[k] >= m_nVertices1D[k]) {
1640 return false;
1641 }
1642 }
1643
1644 return true;
1645}
1646
1659void VolCartesian::_findCellFaceNeighs(long id, int face, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
1660{
1661 long neighId = getCellFaceNeighsLinearId(id, face);
1662 if (neighId < 0) {
1663 return;
1664 } else if (blackList && utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *blackList) != blackList->end()) {
1665 return;
1666 }
1667
1668 neighs->push_back(neighId);
1669}
1670
1686void VolCartesian::_findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
1687{
1688 assert(isThreeDimensional());
1689 if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
1690 return;
1691 }
1692
1693 // Diagonal neighbour
1694 std::array<int, 3> diagNeighIjk(getCellCartesianId(id) + m_edgeNeighDeltas[edge]);
1695 if (isCellCartesianIdValid(diagNeighIjk)) {
1696 long diagNeighId = getCellLinearId(diagNeighIjk);
1697 if (!blackList || utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(diagNeighId, *blackList) == blackList->end()) {
1698 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(diagNeighId, *neighs);
1699 }
1700 }
1701
1702 // Faces incident to the edge
1703 for (int face : m_edgeFaces[edge]) {
1704 _findCellFaceNeighs(id, face, blackList, neighs);
1705 }
1706}
1707
1721void VolCartesian::_findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
1722{
1723 std::array<int, 3> cellIjk = getCellCartesianId(id);
1724 std::array<int, 3> vertexIjk = getVertexCartesianId(cellIjk, vertex);
1725
1726 for (const auto &delta : m_vertexNeighDeltas) {
1727 // Get the Cartesian index
1728 std::array<int, 3> neighIjk(vertexIjk + delta);
1729 if (neighIjk == cellIjk) {
1730 continue;
1731 } else if (!isCellCartesianIdValid(neighIjk)) {
1732 continue;
1733 }
1734
1735 // Get the linear neighbour index and, if it's not on the blacklist,
1736 // add it to the list of neighbours
1737 long neighId = getCellLinearId(neighIjk);
1738 if (!blackList || utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *blackList) == blackList->end()) {
1739 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
1740 }
1741 }
1742}
1743
1751std::vector<long> VolCartesian::extractCellSubSet(std::array<int, 3> const &ijkMin, std::array<int, 3> const &ijkMax) const
1752{
1753 int nSubsetCells_x = ijkMax[0] - ijkMin[0] + 1;
1754 int nSubsetCells_y = ijkMax[1] - ijkMin[1] + 1;
1755 int nSubsetCells_z = ijkMax[2] - ijkMin[2] + 1;
1756
1757 std::vector<long> ids;
1758 ids.resize(nSubsetCells_x * nSubsetCells_y * nSubsetCells_z);
1759
1760 std::vector<long>::iterator it = ids.begin();
1761 for (int k = ijkMin[2]; k <= ijkMax[2]; ++k) {
1762 for (int j = ijkMin[1]; j <= ijkMax[1]; ++j) {
1763 for (int i = ijkMin[0]; i <= ijkMax[0]; ++i) {
1764 *it = getCellLinearId(i, j, k);
1765 ++it;
1766 }
1767 }
1768 }
1769
1770 return ids;
1771}
1772
1780std::vector<long> VolCartesian::extractCellSubSet(int idMin, int idMax) const
1781{
1782 return extractCellSubSet(getCellCartesianId(idMin), getCellCartesianId(idMax));
1783}
1784
1792std::vector<long> VolCartesian::extractCellSubSet(std::array<double, 3> const &pointMin, std::array<double, 3> const &pointMax) const
1793{
1794 return extractCellSubSet(locatePointCartesian(pointMin), locatePointCartesian(pointMax));
1795}
1796
1804std::vector<long> VolCartesian::extractVertexSubSet(std::array<int, 3> const &ijkMin, std::array<int, 3> const &ijkMax) const
1805{
1806 int nSubsetVertices_x = ijkMax[0] - ijkMin[0] + 1;
1807 int nSubsetVertices_y = ijkMax[1] - ijkMin[1] + 1;
1808 int nSubsetVertices_z = ijkMax[2] - ijkMin[2] + 1;
1809
1810 std::vector<long> ids;
1811 ids.resize(nSubsetVertices_x * nSubsetVertices_y * nSubsetVertices_z);
1812
1813 std::vector<long>::iterator it = ids.begin();
1814 for (int k = ijkMin[2]; k <= ijkMax[2]; ++k) {
1815 for (int j = ijkMin[1]; j <= ijkMax[1]; ++j) {
1816 for (int i = ijkMin[0]; i <= ijkMax[0]; ++i) {
1817 *it = getVertexLinearId(i, j, k);
1818 ++it;
1819 }
1820 }
1821 }
1822
1823 return ids;
1824}
1825
1833std::vector<long> VolCartesian::extractVertexSubSet(int idMin, int idMax) const
1834{
1835 return extractVertexSubSet(getVertexCartesianId(idMin), getVertexCartesianId(idMax));
1836}
1837
1845std::vector<long> VolCartesian::extractVertexSubSet(std::array<double, 3> const &pointMin, std::array<double, 3> const &pointMax) const
1846{
1847 return extractVertexSubSet(locatePointCartesian(pointMin), locatePointCartesian(pointMax));
1848}
1849
1858std::array<double, 3> VolCartesian::getOrigin() const
1859{
1860 return m_minCoords;
1861}
1862
1870void VolCartesian::setOrigin(const std::array<double, 3> &origin)
1871{
1872 std::array<double, 3> translation = origin - getOrigin();
1873 translate(translation);
1874}
1875
1881void VolCartesian::translate(const std::array<double, 3> &translation)
1882{
1883 for (int n = 0; n < 3; ++n) {
1884 m_minCoords[n] += translation[n];
1885 m_maxCoords[n] += translation[n];
1886
1887 for (int i = 1; i < m_nVertices1D[n]; ++i) {
1888 m_vertexCoords[n][i] += translation[n];
1889 }
1890
1891 for (int i = 1; i < m_nCells1D[n]; ++i) {
1892 m_cellCenters[n][i] += translation[n];
1893 }
1894 }
1895
1896 setBoundingBox(m_minCoords, m_maxCoords);
1897
1898 VolumeKernel::translate(translation);
1899}
1900
1909void VolCartesian::rotate(const std::array<double, 3> &n0, const std::array<double, 3> &n1, double angle)
1910{
1911 BITPIT_UNUSED(n0);
1912 BITPIT_UNUSED(n1);
1913 BITPIT_UNUSED(angle);
1914
1915 throw std::runtime_error("It is not possible to rotate a Cartesian patch.");
1916}
1917
1923std::array<double, 3> VolCartesian::getLengths() const
1924{
1925 return (m_maxCoords - m_minCoords);
1926}
1927
1934void VolCartesian::setLengths(const std::array<double, 3> &lengths)
1935{
1936 // Set the maximum coordinate
1937 m_maxCoords = m_minCoords + lengths;
1938
1939 // Reset the bounding box
1940 setBoundingBox(m_minCoords, m_maxCoords);
1941
1942 // If needed update the discretization
1943 if (m_nVertices > 0) {
1944 // Rebuild the discretization
1945 setDiscretization(m_nCells1D);
1946
1947 // Rebuild vertex coordinates
1948 for (Vertex vertex : m_vertices) {
1949 long id = vertex.getId();
1950 vertex.setCoords(evalVertexCoords(id));
1951 }
1952 }
1953}
1954
1961void VolCartesian::scale(const std::array<double, 3> &scaling, const std::array<double, 3> &center)
1962{
1963 for (int n = 0; n < 3; ++n) {
1964 m_minCoords[n] = center[n] + scaling[n] * (m_minCoords[n] - center[n]);
1965 m_maxCoords[n] = center[n] + scaling[n] * (m_maxCoords[n] - center[n]);
1966
1967 for (int i = 1; i < m_nVertices1D[n]; ++i) {
1968 m_vertexCoords[n][i] = center[n] + scaling[n] * (m_vertexCoords[n][i] - center[n]);
1969 }
1970
1971 for (int i = 1; i < m_nCells1D[n]; ++i) {
1972 m_cellCenters[n][i] = center[n] + scaling[n] * (m_cellCenters[n][i] - center[n]);
1973 }
1974
1975 m_cellSpacings[n] *= scaling[n];
1976 }
1977
1978 initializeCellVolume();
1979
1980 initializeCellSize();
1981
1982 initializeInterfaceArea();
1983
1984 setBoundingBox(m_minCoords, m_maxCoords);
1985
1986 VolumeKernel::scale(scaling, center);
1987}
1988
1996std::vector<double> VolCartesian::convertToVertexData(const std::vector<double> &cellData) const
1997{
1998 int dimension = getDimension();
1999
2000 int nContribs_x = 2;
2001 int nContribs_y = 2;
2002 int nContribs_z = dimension - 1;
2003
2004 std::vector<int> nodeCounter(getVertexCount());
2005 std::vector<double> vertexData(getVertexCount());
2006 std::fill (vertexData.begin(), vertexData.end(), 0.);
2007
2008 for (int k = 0; (isThreeDimensional()) ? (k < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_Z]) : (k < 1); k++) {
2009 for (int j = 0; j < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_Y]; ++j) {
2010 for (int i = 0; i < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_X]; ++i) {
2011 // Get cell contribution
2012 long cellId = getCellLinearId(i, j, k);
2013 double cellContrib = cellData[cellId];
2014
2015 // Eval vertex data
2016 for (int n = 0; n < nContribs_z; n++) {
2017 int k_v = k + n;
2018 for (int m = 0; m < nContribs_y; ++m) {
2019 int j_v = j + m;
2020 for (int l = 0; l < nContribs_x; ++l) {
2021 int i_v = i + l;
2022
2023 // Get vertex index
2024 long vertexId = getVertexLinearId(i_v, j_v, k_v);
2025
2026 // Sum cell contribution
2027 vertexData[vertexId] += cellContrib;
2028 nodeCounter[vertexId]++;
2029 }
2030 }
2031 }
2032 }
2033 }
2034 }
2035
2036 // Average values
2037 for (int i = 0; i < getVertexCount(); ++i) {
2038 vertexData[i] /= nodeCounter[i];
2039 }
2040
2041 return vertexData;
2042}
2043
2051std::vector<double> VolCartesian::convertToCellData(const std::vector<double> &vertexData) const
2052{
2053 int dimension = getDimension();
2054
2055 int nContribs_x = 2;
2056 int nContribs_y = 2;
2057 int nContribs_z = dimension - 1;
2058
2059 std::vector<double> cellData(getCellCount());
2060 std::fill (cellData.begin(), cellData.end(), 0.);
2061
2062 for (int k = 0; (isThreeDimensional()) ? (k < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_Z]) : (k < 1); k++) {
2063 for (int j = 0; j < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_Y]; ++j) {
2064 for (int i = 0; i < m_nCells1D[Vertex::COORD_X]; ++i) {
2065 // Eval cell data
2066 long cellId = getCellLinearId(i, j, k);
2067 for (int n = 0; n < nContribs_z; ++n) {
2068 int k_v = k + n;
2069 for (int m = 0; m < nContribs_y; ++m) {
2070 int j_v = j + m;
2071 for (int l = 0; l < nContribs_x; ++l) {
2072 int i_v = i + l;
2073
2074 // Get vertex contribution
2075 long vertexId = getVertexLinearId(i_v, j_v, k_v);
2076 double vertexContrib = vertexData[vertexId];
2077
2078 // Sum vertex contribution
2079 cellData[cellId] += vertexContrib;
2080 }
2081 }
2082 }
2083 }
2084 }
2085 }
2086
2087 double weight = pow(0.5, dimension);
2088 for (int i = 0; i < getCellCount(); ++i) {
2089 cellData[i] *= weight;
2090 }
2091
2092 return cellData;
2093}
2094
2095
2109int VolCartesian::linearCellInterpolation(const std::array<double,3> &point,
2110 std::vector<int> *stencil, std::vector<double> *weights) const
2111{
2112 std::array<int, 3> ijk_point = locatePointCartesian(point);
2113 if (ijk_point[0] < 0) {
2114 stencil->clear();
2115 weights->clear();
2116 return 0;
2117 }
2118
2119 int dimension = getDimension();
2120
2121 int nContribs_x = 1;
2122 int nContribs_y = 1;
2123 int nContribs_z = 1;
2124
2125 std::array< std::array<int,2>, 3> cStencil;
2126 std::array< std::array<double,2>, 3> cWeights;
2127 for (int d = 0; d < dimension; ++d) {
2128 // Find cell index
2129 int index_point = ijk_point[d];
2130 if (point[d] < m_cellCenters[d][index_point]) {
2131 index_point = index_point - 1;
2132 }
2133
2134 int index_next = index_point + 1;
2135
2136 if (index_point < 0) {
2137 cStencil[d][0] = 0;
2138 cWeights[d][0] = 1.;
2139 } else if (index_next > m_nCells1D[d] - 1) {
2140 cStencil[d][0] = m_nCells1D[d] - 1;
2141 cWeights[d][0] = 1.;
2142 } else {
2143 if (d == 0) {
2144 nContribs_x = 2;
2145 } else if (d == 1) {
2146 nContribs_y = 2;
2147 } else {
2148 nContribs_z = 2;
2149 }
2150
2151 cStencil[d][0] = index_point;
2152 cStencil[d][1] = index_next;
2153
2154 cWeights[d][1] = (point[d] - m_cellCenters[d][index_point]) / m_cellSpacings[d] ;
2155 cWeights[d][0] = 1.0 - cWeights[d][1];
2156 }
2157 }
2158
2159 for (int d = dimension; d < 3; ++d) {
2160 cStencil[d][0] = 0;
2161 cWeights[d][0] = 1.;
2162 }
2163
2164 int stencilSize = nContribs_x * nContribs_y * nContribs_z;
2165 stencil->resize(stencilSize);
2166 weights->resize(stencilSize);
2167
2168 std::vector<int>::iterator itrStencil = stencil->begin();
2169 std::vector<double>::iterator itrWeights = weights->begin();
2170 for (int k = 0; k < nContribs_z; ++k) {
2171 for (int j = 0; j < nContribs_y; ++j) {
2172 for (int i = 0; i < nContribs_x; ++i) {
2173 int &is = cStencil[0][i];
2174 int &js = cStencil[1][j];
2175 int &ks = cStencil[2][k];
2176
2177 double &iw = cWeights[0][i];
2178 double &jw = cWeights[1][j];
2179 double &kw = cWeights[2][k];
2180
2181 *itrStencil = getCellLinearId(is, js, ks);
2182 *itrWeights = iw *jw * kw;
2183
2184 ++itrStencil;
2185 ++itrWeights;
2186 }
2187 }
2188 }
2189
2190 return stencilSize;
2191}
2192
2206int VolCartesian::linearVertexInterpolation(const std::array<double,3> &point,
2207 std::vector<int> *stencil, std::vector<double> *weights) const
2208{
2209 std::array<int, 3> ijk_point = locatePointCartesian(point);
2210 if (ijk_point[0] < 0) {
2211 stencil->clear();
2212 weights->clear();
2213 return 0;
2214 }
2215
2216 int dimension = getDimension();
2217
2218 int nContribs_x = 2;
2219 int nContribs_y = 2;
2220 int nContribs_z = dimension - 1;
2221
2222 std::array< std::array<int,2>, 3> cStencil;
2223 std::array< std::array<double,2>, 3> cWeights;
2224 for (int d = 0; d < dimension; ++d) {
2225 int index_point = ijk_point[d];
2226 int index_next = index_point +1;
2227
2228 cStencil[d][0] = index_point;
2229 cStencil[d][1] = index_next;
2230
2231 cWeights[d][1] = (point[d] - m_vertexCoords[d][index_point]) / m_cellSpacings[d];
2232 cWeights[d][0] = 1.0 - cWeights[d][1];
2233 }
2234
2235 for (int d = dimension; d < 3; ++d) {
2236 cStencil[d][0] = 0;
2237 cWeights[d][0] = 1.;
2238 }
2239
2240 int stencilSize = uipow(2, dimension);
2241 stencil->resize(stencilSize);
2242 weights->resize(stencilSize);
2243
2244 std::vector<int>::iterator itrStencil = stencil->begin();
2245 std::vector<double>::iterator itrWeights = weights->begin();
2246 for (int k = 0; k < nContribs_z; ++k) {
2247 for (int j = 0; j < nContribs_y; ++j) {
2248 for (int i = 0; i < nContribs_x; ++i) {
2249 int &is = cStencil[0][i];
2250 int &js = cStencil[1][j];
2251 int &ks = cStencil[2][k];
2252
2253 double &iw = cWeights[0][i];
2254 double &jw = cWeights[1][j];
2255 double &kw = cWeights[2][k];
2256
2257 *itrStencil = getVertexLinearId(is, js, ks);
2258 *itrWeights = iw * jw * kw;
2259
2260 ++itrStencil;
2261 ++itrWeights;
2262 }
2263 }
2264 }
2265
2266 return stencilSize;
2267}
2268
2275std::array<double, 3> VolCartesian::evalCellCentroid(long id) const
2276{
2277 std::array<int, 3> ijk = getCellCartesianId(id);
2278
2279 return evalCellCentroid(ijk);
2280}
2281
2288std::array<double, 3> VolCartesian::evalCellCentroid(const std::array<int, 3> &ijk) const
2289{
2290 std::array<double, 3> centroid;
2291 for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d) {
2292 if (ijk[d] >= 0) {
2293 centroid[d] = m_cellCenters[d][ijk[d]];
2294 } else {
2295 centroid[d] = m_minCoords[d];
2296 }
2297 }
2298
2299 return centroid;
2300}
2301
2308const std::vector<double> & VolCartesian::getCellCentroids(int direction) const
2309{
2310 return m_cellCenters[direction];
2311}
2312
2320std::array<int, 3> VolCartesian::getCellFaceNeighsCartesianId(long id, int face) const
2321{
2322 int neighSide = face % 2;
2323 int neighDirection = static_cast<int>(std::floor(face / 2));
2324
2325 std::array<int, 3> neighIjk(getCellCartesianId(id));
2326 if (neighSide == 0) {
2327 neighIjk[neighDirection]--;
2328 } else {
2329 neighIjk[neighDirection]++;
2330 }
2331
2332 return neighIjk;
2333}
2334
2342long VolCartesian::getCellFaceNeighsLinearId(long id, int face) const
2343{
2344 std::array<int, 3> neighIjk = getCellFaceNeighsCartesianId(id, face);
2345
2346 long neighId;
2347 if (isCellCartesianIdValid(neighIjk)) {
2348 neighId = getCellLinearId(neighIjk);
2349 } else {
2350 neighId = Cell::NULL_ID;
2351 }
2352
2353 return neighId;
2354}
